TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerAutoFormatCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerAutoFormatCollection Implements IList
public ref class DesignerAutoFormatCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type DesignerAutoFormatCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示控件设计器中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和任何派生类将属性定义 为 对象。The class and any derived class defines the property as a object. 控件开发人员可以覆盖 派生控件设计器中的属性，添加自定义自动格式设置样式，并将支持的格式的集合返回到可视化设计器。Control developers can override the property in a derived control designer, add custom automatic formatting styles, and return the collection of supported formats to the visual designer. 添加对象时，集合会动态增加。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 此集合中的索引从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用 属性可确定集合中有多少自动样式格式。Use the property to determine how many automatic style formats are in the collection. 此外，使用 方法和属性提供以下功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 向 集合添加单个格式的方法。The method to add a single format to the collection. - 用于在集合中的特定索引处添加格式的方法。The method to add a format at a particular index within the collection. - 用于删除格式的方法。The method to remove a format. - 用于移除特定索引处的格式的方法。The method to remove the format at a particular index. - 用于确定特定格式是否已存在于集合中的方法。The method to determine whether a particular format is already in the collection. - 用于检索集合中的格式索引的方法。The method to retrieve the index of a format within the collection. - 用于获取或设置特定索引处的格式的属性，使用数组表示法。The property to get or set the format at a particular index, using array notation. - 要从集合中移除所有格式的方法。The method to remove all formats from the collection. - 用于确定集合中格式数目的属性。The property to determine the number of formats in the collection. - 用于获取格式在集合中的位置的方法。The method to get the position of a format within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在自定义控件设计器中实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a custom control designer. 派生的控件设计器 通过添加派生自类的自定义自动格式的三个实例来实现属性 。The derived control designer implements the property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the class. [!code-csharp[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/CS/DesignerAutoFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/VB/DesignerAutoFormat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性通常用于在循环访问集合中的对象时确定上限索引。The property typically is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 由于集合索引是从零开始的，因此第一个元素位于索引处， `0` 最后一个元素位于索引处 `Count-1` 。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 索引器检索 集合中指定索引处的对象，或设置集合中指定索引处的格式。Use the indexer to retrieve the object at the specified index within the collection or to set the format at the specified index within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法来索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以 `i` 使用 `AutoFormats(i)` Microsoft 标志或 c # 的表示法在 index 处为元素编制索引 `AutoFormats[i]` 。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `AutoFormats(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `AutoFormats[i]` for C#. 如果具有对对象的引用 并需要集合中对象的索引，请使用 方法。When you have a reference to the object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-
is greater than the property.

summary.span: 获取控件将在运行时显示的最大外部尺寸。

span.span: Gets the maximum outer dimensions of the control as it will appear at run time.

value.span: 包含设计图面上的控件的高度和宽度的 结构。

span.span: A structure that contains the height and width of the control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检查集合中的每个格式，并返回结构中的最大高度和最大宽度 。The property examines each format in the collection and returns the largest height and the largest width in a structure. 可视化设计器（如 Visual Studio 2005）使用 来确定 **自动套用格式** 对话框的初始大小。A visual designer, such as Visual Studio 2005, uses the to determine the initial size of the **AutoFormat** dialog box. 最小大小为 200 x 200 像素。The minimum size is 200-by-200 pixels.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从集合中移除的第一个匹配项 `format` 。The method removes the first occurrence of `format` from the collection. 如果 对象不包含 `format` ，则集合保持不变。If the object does not contain `format`, the collection remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过 对要比较的对象使用方法来确定相等性 。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects that are being compared. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间与值成正比 。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value. 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的格式，请使用 方法。To remove a format at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中删除所有格式，请使用 方法。To remove all formats from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 从集合中移除项时，集合中的后续项的索引值会发生更改。When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举集合不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会导致枚举过程中出现异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 在 整个枚举过程中，通过使用方法锁定集合以保证线程安全。Lock the collection by using the method during the entire enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 有关锁定线程安全访问的集合的详细信息，请参阅 。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .
